name: ColorMe
description: ColorMe - UNIQUE. UNIQUE. CREATIVE. USEFUL. In this game you are given the opportunity to express themselves. Your world is the way you paint it. To paint all that will see the building, the tree, and much more .... In the course of the game you will be the development of fine motor skills, the formation of aesthetic taste, knowledge about the world, familiarity with the colors, introduction to art. Be creative and have only positive emotions!
